title: Archer
contents: subtitle | Medium humanoid (any race), any alignment
property | Languages | any one language (usually Common)
description | Archer's Eye (3/Day) | As a bonus action, the archer can add 1d10 to its next attack or damage roll with a longbow or shortbow.
description | Multiattack | The archer makes two attacks with its longbow.
description | Shortsword | Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.
description | Longbow | Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.
